info.title: SpectroCoin Merchant API
info.description: This is an API designend for merchants who are using SpectroCoin services and wishes to integrate them locally.

tags.name: createOrder
tags.description: Create Merchant order to be paid by customer

merchantId.description: Merchant ID assigned to your account

apiId.description: API ID of specific API you have configured on your merchant account

orderId.description: Custom order ID. Must be unique per API. If not provided it will be generated.

payCurrency.description: Currency in which merchant customer will pay the order. Currently only "BTC"

payAmount.description: Pay amount in pay currency that should be paid by merchant customer. If not provided receive amount will be used to calculate pay amount

receiveAmount.description: Receive amount in receive currency (which is configured at API configuration) that merchant will be funded after merchant customers payment approval. If not provided pay amount will be used to calculate receive amount

description.description: Order description. Will be presented for merchant customer at payment window

culture.description: Merchant customer culture payment window to be presented

callbackUrl.description: Url of merchant endpoint callback about order status to be returned

successUrl.description: Url of merchant page customer should be redirected after successful payment

failureUrl.description: Url of merchant page customer should be redirected after unsuccessful payment

sign.description: Signature required for signing create order request

orderId.description: Merchant provided or generated order id

payAmount.description: Amount of payment currency to be paid by merchant customer

receiveCurrency.description: Currency to be funded to merchant account

receiveAmount.description: Amount of receive currency to be funded to merchant account

validUntil.description: Timestamp until when order is valid

redirectUrl.description: SpectroCoin payment window url where merchant customer may be redirected
